dict.acceptation: 清洁的；整齐的；新的；正派的；
（使）清洁；变干净；除去…的灰尘；使…干净；

sent.orig: A dual-threshold RELAX-CLEAN estimation algorithm is proposed based on the spatial CLEAN algorithm.
sent.trans: 本文提出了一种基于空域CLEAN算法的双门限RELAX-CLEAN源数估计算法。

sent.orig: Clean production includes a clean production process and resulting a clean product.
sent.trans: 清洁生产包括清洁的生产过程和清洁的产品两方面内容。

sent.orig: A room attendant in the clean room, her primary responsibility is to organize a clean room.
sent.trans: 一名客房服务员在清扫客房，她的主要职责是把客房整理干净。

sent.orig: Products use high-quality materials, and by the anti-bacterial processing, tolerance clean and easy to clean.
sent.trans: 产品使用优质材料，并经抗菌加工，干净耐污，易清洁。

sent.orig: Ensure all equipment is cleaned regularly and after use and keep workstations clean, clean and tidy.
sent.trans: 确保所有厨房设备的日常清理，且保证工作台使用完毕后的整洁。
